item.title: JPMorgan Chase says banks could fight Trump credit card rate cap: 'Everything's on the table'
item.description: Banks say a proposed 10% cap on credit card interest rates would result in fewer credit card accounts for Americans and a hit to the U.S. economy.

item.title: JPMorgan Chase tops estimates as trading revenue exceeds expectations
item.description: JPMorgan will give investors a view into how consumers and corporations fared toward the end of last year and issue guidance on how 2026 may develop.

item.title: Alibaba-backed PixVerse launches real-time AI video tool, top executive tells CNBC
item.description: Co-founder Jaden Xie told CNBC that the company is about to close another financing round, after raising $100 million in the last 6 months.

item.title: Stocks making the biggest moves premarket: L3Harris, JPMorgan, Delta, Intel, AMD and more
item.description: These are the stocks posting the largest moves in early trading.

item.title: BNY raises profit target as CEO Robin Vince says 'turnaround' is taking hold
item.description: BNY raised a pair of key medium-term performance targets on Tuesday.
